personal.name: Aniket Poojari
personal.title: Machine Learning Engineer
personal.subtitle: Building Intelligent Systems that Scale from Research to Production
bio: Machine Learning Engineer with 2+ years of experience deploying scalable AI systems across fintech, edtech, and academia. I specialize in bridging the gap between cutting-edge research and production-ready solutions—from building secure on-premise RAG chatbots that cut support time by 67%, to designing distributed ML pipelines that process gigabytes of financial data.

My expertise spans the full ML lifecycle: from training diffusion models and fine-tuning LLMs with LoRA/PEFT, to architecting agentic AI workflows and deploying enterprise systems with Docker, Kubernetes, and CI/CD. Whether it's optimizing small language models for 40% cost reduction or building multi-modal RAG systems, I focus on creating AI solutions that deliver measurable business impact.

Currently seeking full-time ML Engineer opportunities where I can leverage my experience in LLMs, MLOps, and production AI systems to solve complex real-world problems. Let's connect and build something extraordinary together!

projects.title: Agentic AI Research Assistant
projects.description: LangGraph-powered autonomous research assistant with state-machine architecture, multi-provider LLM support, and intelligent tool orchestration for web search, summarization, fact-checking, and citation management.

projects.title: BiLoRA: Dual Adapter Fine-Tuning
projects.description: Streamlit application implementing dual LoRA adapters for simultaneous code generation and docstring creation using parameter-efficient fine-tuning techniques.

projects.title: Multi-Modal RAG QA System
projects.description: Production-ready RAG pipeline with Flask backend integrating LangChain and ChromaDB for intelligent extraction and Q&A across PDFs and websites, supporting text, tables, and images.

projects.title: Text-to-Image using Diffusion from Scratch
projects.description: Custom diffusion model with UNet, VAE, and CLIP embeddings trained on 8K image-caption pairs. Optimized on AWS SageMaker with DeepSpeed, achieving 3× speedup and 68% cost reduction via Spot Instances.

projects.title: Text Summarization GPT from Scratch
projects.description: 125M-parameter transformer pre-trained from scratch and fine-tuned on XSum dataset for abstractive summarization, achieving 5.4 ROUGE score.

projects.title: Image Depth Map Prediction
projects.description: Vision Transformer-based monocular depth estimation achieving 19cm RMSE with 15% accuracy improvement in complex scenes.

projects.title: Automated Stock Price Prediction System
projects.description: CNN-based temporal prediction model with XGBoost feature selection for reproducible stock price forecasting.

projects.title: Lane Segmentation
projects.description: U-Net semantic segmentation model for autonomous vehicle lane detection achieving 80% IoU, deployed as real-time Flask inference API.

projects.title: Motor Self Inspection
projects.description: Computer vision web application for automated vehicle damage detection accelerating insurance claim processing.

projects.title: Image Denoising
projects.description: Convolutional autoencoder for noise reduction in corrupted images using encoder-decoder architecture.

projects.title: NYC Taxi Trip duration prediction
projects.description: CatBoost gradient boosting model with engineered geospatial and temporal features for NYC taxi trip duration estimation.

projects.title: Sentiment Analysis of tweets
projects.description: PyTorch LSTM network for sentiment classification on airline customer feedback tweets.

projects.title: Emergency VS Non Emergency Vehicle Sound Classification
projects.description: TensorFlow LSTM model trained on mel-spectrogram features for real-time emergency vehicle audio detection.

projects.title: Movie Recommendation
projects.description: Hybrid recommendation engine combining collaborative filtering and content-based approaches for personalized movie suggestions.

projects.title: Subway Surfers CNN
projects.description: PyTorch CNN for autonomous gameplay using screen capture and real-time decision-making.

projects.title: Human Computer Interaction Using Hand Gestures and Voice
projects.description: Multimodal computer control system combining MediaPipe hand tracking and speech recognition for touchless interaction.

projects.title: Insomnia Chatbot
projects.description: Intent-based conversational AI chatbot with command execution capabilities.

projects.title: 2048 Using Speech Command Identification
projects.description: PyTorch CNN for real-time voice-controlled 2048 game using audio command classification.

projects.title: Cricket Shot Classification
projects.description: Keypoint R-CNN with COCO-pretrained weights for cricket shot pose classification via skeletal keypoint analysis.

projects.title: Texture Generation
projects.description: DC-GAN architecture for procedural texture synthesis generating realistic material patterns.

projects.title: Translating Text From Russian To English With Attention
projects.description: Sequence-to-sequence encoder-decoder model with attention mechanism for Russian-English neural machine translation.

blogs.title: Text-To-Image using Diffusion model with AWS Sagemaker Distributed Training

Data Shift in Machine Learning: Understanding, Detecting, and Addressing Challenges

highlights: Led deployment of a secure on-premise RAG chatbot and LLM infrastructure, cutting internal support ticket resolution from 3 days to 1 day while ensuring complete enterprise data privacy
Designed efficient small language models with 12% higher accuracy on CPU than standard LLMs, reducing infrastructure costs by 40% and inference latency by 35%
Supported ML and Cloud Computing courses by building and maintaining PyTorch/Scikit-learn lab environments on GCP and Colab for 300+ students, ensuring smooth execution of experiments
Refactored and standardized 15+ lab notebooks with version control and reproducible pipelines, streamlining grading and reducing student runtime errors by 35%
Built ML pipelines for block-trade allocation and forecasting, cutting allocation error rates by 15% and improving forecast accuracy by 20%
Automated data infrastructure using Docker and PostgreSQL, increasing data retrieval speed by 75% and reducing system downtime by 30%
Leveraged Apache Spark to analyze gigabytes of trading data, detecting discrepancies and boosting strategy testing accuracy by 50%
Implemented automated trade-cleansing workflows (Random Forest, XGBoost), cutting manual workload by 30% and enhancing model reliability by 25%
Automated vehicle damage detection in insurance claims by training a Mask R-CNN model, raising detection accuracy by 18% and cutting manual claim processing by 45%
Integrated ML workflows into the Django-based claims system, reducing overall claim processing time by 35%

achievements.title: Smart India Hackathon 2019
achievements.description: Led a 5-member team to develop a smart research content management platform for PD Hinduja Hospital, reducing research proposal-to-approval time by 60% and enhancing process efficiency.

achievements.title: IEEE Paper Publication
achievements.description: Led the development of a computer vision interface enabling control via hand gestures and voice using TensorFlow and OpenCV, improving user interaction by 40%, resulting in an IEEE paper publication in March 2019.

testimonials.name: Vivek Kashyap
testimonials.content: Aniket is well focused, hardworking as well as a solution oriented guy. In his term of internship he and team has solved the assigned problem very well before the given timeline. The assigned project was designed and developed by them as expected and meeting all the requirements. I'll highly recommend him, he is good team contributor, very productive, good and can be great problem solver. Best Wishes
